# Exploratory Data Analysis  (EDA)

This EDA summarizes the characteristics, quality, and utility of the following data sources:

- Aggregate Content of ClinicalTrials.gov (AACT) [@AACTDatabaseClinical]       
- Drugs@FDA - U.S. Food & Drug Administration Approved Drugs [@DrugsFDAApproved]

## AACT

AACT is a publicly available relational database that contains all information (protocol and result data elements) about every study registered in ClinicalTrials.gov [@].
